list.name: Time region for panel # Live Threads
Time region for panel # Live Threads

targets.query:
from(bucket: "telegraf")
|> range($range)
|> filter(fn: (r) =>
  r._measurement == "process_cpu_usage" AND
  r.service == "$service" AND
  r._field == "gauge")
|> keep(columns: ["_value", "_time", "_measurement"])

from(bucket: "telegraf")
|> range($range)
|> filter(fn: (r) =>
  r._measurement == "system_cpu_usage" AND
  r.service == "$service" AND
  r._field == "gauge")
|> keep(columns: ["_value", "_time", "_measurement"])
SELECT mean("gauge") FROM "jvm_memory_max" WHERE ("service" =~ /^$service$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)
SELECT mean("gauge") FROM "jvm_memory_max" WHERE ("service" =~ /^$service$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)
SELECT mean("gauge") FROM "jvm_memory_max" WHERE ("service" =~ /^$service$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)

from(bucket: "telegraf")
|> range($range)
|> filter(fn: (r) =>
  r._measurement == "jvm_threads_daemon" AND
  r.service == "$service" AND
  r._field == "gauge")
|> map(fn:(r) => ({
        _time: r._time,
        _value: r._value,
        _measurement: "daemon"
    }))
|> keep(columns: ["_value", "_time", "_measurement"])

lnd = () => {
live = from(bucket: "telegraf")
|> range($range)
|> filter(fn: (r) =>
  r._measurement == "jvm_threads_live" AND
  r.service == "$service" AND
  r._field == "gauge")
|> keep(columns: ["_value", "_time", "_measurement"])
  
daemon = from(bucket: "telegraf")
|> range($range)
|> filter(fn: (r) =>
  r._measurement == "jvm_threads_daemon" AND
  r.service == "$service" AND
  r._field == "gauge")
|> keep(columns: ["_value", "_time", "_measurement"])
  
return join(tables:{live:live, daemon:daemon},on:["_time","_stop","_start", "host"])
    |> map(fn:(r) => ({
        _time: r._time,
        _value: (r._value_live - r._value_daemon),
        _measurement: "non-daemon"
    }))
}

lnd()

stackedPeak = () => {
peak = from(bucket: "telegraf")
|> range($range)
|> filter(fn: (r) =>
  r._measurement == "jvm_threads_peak" AND
  r.service == "$service" AND
  r._field == "gauge")
|> keep(columns: ["_value", "_time", "_measurement"])

live = from(bucket: "telegraf")
|> range($range)
|> filter(fn: (r) =>
  r._measurement == "jvm_threads_live" AND
  r.service == "$service" AND
  r._field == "gauge")
|> keep(columns: ["_value", "_time", "_measurement"])
  

  
return join(tables:{live:live, peak:peak},on:["_time","_stop","_start", "host"])
    |> map(fn:(r) => ({
        _time: r._time,
        _value: (r._value_peak - r._value_live),
        _measurement: "peak"
    }))
}

stackedPeak()
SELECT difference(sum("counter")) FROM "jvm_gc_memory_allocated" WHERE ("service" =~ /^$service$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(15s)
SELECT difference(sum("counter")) FROM "jvm_gc_memory_allocated" WHERE ("service" =~ /^$service$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(15s)

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: -1m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "jvm_classes_loaded" AND
    r.service == "$service" AND
    r._field == "gauge")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_time", "service"])
  |> last()
SELECT mean("gauge") FROM "jvm_memory_max" WHERE ("service" =~ /^$service$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)
SELECT mean("gauge") FROM "jvm_memory_max" WHERE ("service" =~ /^$service$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)
SELECT mean("gauge") FROM "jvm_memory_max" WHERE ("service" =~ /^$service$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)
SELECT mean("gauge") FROM "jvm_memory_max" WHERE ("service" =~ /^$service$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1m) fill(null)

from(bucket: "telegraf")
  |> range(start: -1m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "jvm_classes_unloaded" AND
    r.service == "$service" AND
    r._field == "gauge")
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_time", "service"])
  |> last()
